order_code,

appeal_type,
appeal_opinion,

appeal_stat,
audit_user_id,
buyer_user_id,
seller_user_id,
check_user_id,
check_opinion,
check_time,
) VALUES (
#{id},
#{fhAuditModelId},
#{orderCode},
#{appealTime},
#{appealType},
#{appealOpinion},

mapper.select:
SELECT id as id, fh_audit_model_id as fhAuditModelId, order_code as orderCode, appeal_time as appealTime, appeal_type as appealType, appeal_opinion as appealOpinion, appeal_pics_url as appealPicsUrl, appeal_stat as appealStat, audit_user_id as auditUserId, buyer_user_id as buyerUserId, seller_user_id as sellerUserId, check_user_id as checkUserId, check_opinion as checkOpinion, check_time as checkTime FROM fh_appeal_audit
and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE fh_appeal_audit
fh_audit_model_id = #{fhAuditModelId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
appeal_time = #{appealTime},
appeal_type = #{appealType},
appeal_opinion = #{appealOpinion},
appeal_pics_url = #{appealPicsUrl},
appeal_stat = #{appealStat},
audit_user_id = #{auditUserId},
buyer_user_id = #{buyerUserId},
seller_user_id = #{sellerUserId},
check_user_id = #{checkUserId},
check_opinion = #{checkOpinion},
check_time = #{checkTime},
and id = #{id}
